short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will add a percentage column to the grades table on the gegi website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of only seeing your grade on the total number of points? Want to see it as a percentage? Then look no more!

gegi grades percentage adds the percentage to every grade, average, etc.
